entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
